title: Don’t want Apple’s Studio Display? LG UltraFine 5K is still being made and will be back in stock next month
content:
Reviews for the Apple Studio Display dropped today to a mixed reception, with an apparent webcam quality software issue plaguing reviews. However, one big takeaway is that the display quality is almost identical to the , as they feature almost the exact same panel. So if you don’t care about build quality or nice speakers, you can get that instead …

more…
